trans-unit.source: Provides a hash table / dictionary implementation that contains [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] resources used by components and other elements of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个哈希表 / 字典实现，其中包含[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]所使用的组件和其他元素的资源[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The items in a ResourceDictionary are not immediately processed when application code is loaded by a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] loader.
trans-unit.target: 不通过加载应用程序代码时立即处理的 ResourceDictionary 中的项[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]加载程序。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the ResourceDictionary persists as an object, and the individual values are processed only when they are specifically requested.
trans-unit.target: 相反，ResourceDictionary 仍然作为对象存在，仅当他们专门请求时，才会处理各个值。

trans-unit.source: The ResourceDictionary class is not derived from <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryBase>.
trans-unit.target: ResourceDictionary 类不被派生自<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryBase>.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryBase>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the ResourceDictionary class implements <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> but relies on a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> internally.
trans-unit.target: 相反，ResourceDictionary 类实现<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>但依赖于<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>内部。</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> </xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], the ResourceDictionary class is typically an implicit collection element that is the object element value of several `Resources` properties, when given in property element syntax.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，ResourceDictionary 类通常是为多个对象元素值的隐式集合元素`Resources`属性，在给定属性元素语法中。

trans-unit.source: For details on implicit collections in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], see [XAML Syntax In Detail](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息中的隐式集合[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，请参阅[在详细信息的 XAML 语法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: An exception is when you want to specify a merged dictionary; for details, see [Merged Resource Dictionaries](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 例外情况是当你想要指定合并的字典;有关详细信息，请参阅[合并资源字典](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Another possible [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage is to declare a resource dictionary as a discrete [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file, and either load it at run time with <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A> or include it in a (full-trust) project as a resource or loose file.
trans-unit.target: 另一种可能[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]用法就是声明为离散的资源字典[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]文件，并在加载它运行时<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A>或将其作为资源或松散文件 （完全信任） 项目中包括。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, ResourceDictionary can be declared as an object element, serving as the root element of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，ResourceDictionary 可以声明为对象元素，充当的根元素[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: You must map the appropriate XML namespace values (default for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] namespace and typically `x:` for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] namespace) onto the ResourceDictionary element if you plan to use it as the root element.
trans-unit.target: 你必须映射适当的 XML 命名空间值 (默认为[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]命名空间和通常`x:`为[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]命名空间) 到 ResourceDictionary 元素，如果你打算将其用作根元素。

trans-unit.source: Then you can add child elements that define the resources, each with an value.
trans-unit.target: 然后，可以添加定义的资源，每个都有一个值的子元素。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *resourcesProperty* A property specifying a property element, where the value type of that property is ResourceDictionary.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 隐式集合用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*resourcesProperty*指定一个属性元素，该属性的值类型是 ResourceDictionary 的其中一个属性。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is the `Resources` property of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>, or of <xref:System.Windows.Application> in an application resources case.
trans-unit.target: 通常，这是`Resources`属性<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>，或<xref:System.Windows.Application>中应用程序资源的情况。</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: *oneOrMoreResources* One or more resources specified as object elements.
trans-unit.target: *oneOrMoreResources*作为对象元素所指定的一个或多个资源。

trans-unit.source: Each resource that you specify must have an [x:Key Directive](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) assigned.
trans-unit.target: 你指定每个资源必须具有[X:key 指令](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)分配。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Adds a resource by key to this <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将按的键的资源添加到此<xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to add a duplicate key raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: 尝试添加重复的键会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Keys are always added to the base dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 密钥始终将添加到基的字典。

trans-unit.source: Keys in <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A> within the current <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> are not checked for duplication, only the base dictionary is checked for duplicates.
trans-unit.target: 密钥存储在<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A>在当前<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>未检查重复，仅基字典检查重复项。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> </xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the key to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的键的名称。

trans-unit.source: The value of the resource to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的资源的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref> is locked or read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"> </xref>被锁定或只读的。

trans-unit.source: An element with the same key already exists in the <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中已存在具有相同键的元素<xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Begins the initialization phase for this <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 开始此初始化阶段<xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is an indication that the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> are about to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法是相对值的内容<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>将要加载。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The next step in the process is to call <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.EndInit%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 该过程的下一步是调用<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.EndInit%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Do not call BeginInit more than once, before calling <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.EndInit%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 不要调用 BeginInit 不止一次，在调用<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.EndInit%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.EndInit%2A>之前

trans-unit.source: Doing so will raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: 执行此操作将引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Called BeginInit more than once before <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.EndInit*> was called.
trans-unit.target: 不止一次之前调用 BeginInit<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.EndInit*>曾。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.EndInit*>

trans-unit.source: Clears all keys (and values) in the base <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在基类中清除了所有键 （和值） <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This does not clear any merged dictionary items.
trans-unit.target: 这并不会清除任何合并字典项。

trans-unit.source: If you need to clear merged dictionary items, obtain the particular dictionary from <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A> collection and specifically call Clear on that <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>, although typically the dictionaries are remote and you might not have access.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要清除合并的字典项时，获取从特定字典<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A>集合并专门调用上，清除<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>，尽管通常字典是远程的你可能没有访问权限。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> </xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, remove the entire <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> from <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A> by calling Remove on the generic collection.
trans-unit.target: 或者，删除整个<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>从<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A>通过泛型集合上调用删除。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A> </xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref> contains an element with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否<xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref>包含具有指定键的元素。

trans-unit.source: If the requested key is not in this resource dictionary, the resource lookup logic will also check the merged dictionaries.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求的项不是此资源字典中，资源查找逻辑还会检查合并的字典。

trans-unit.source: The key to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要查找中的键<xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref> contains a key-value pair with the specified key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref>包含具有指定的键 / 值对键; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Copies the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref> elements to a one-dimensional <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 副本<xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref>元素的一维<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>的指定索引处。</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>

trans-unit.source: This copies only the base dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 这会将复制仅基的字典。

trans-unit.source: The result array will have no <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A> if it is reconstituted to be a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> again.
trans-unit.target: 结果数组不会有<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A>如果重建为<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>再次。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> </xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> objects copied from the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 目标的一维数组<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>从复制的对象<xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref>实例。</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 该数组必须具有从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of `array` where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的索引`array`复制开始处。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of entries in the base <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取基中的条目数<xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The current number of entries in the base dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 当前基字典中的条目数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the deferrable content for this resource dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此资源字典的可以推迟内容。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Ends the initialization phase, and invalidates the previous tree such that all changes made to keys during the initialization phase can be accounted for.
trans-unit.target: 结束初始化阶段中，并使以前的树，以便可以计期间初始化阶段，对密钥进行的所有更改。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.BeginInit%2A> and EndInit follow a transaction model.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.BeginInit%2A>然后 EndInit 按照一种事务模型。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.BeginInit%2A> marks the dictionary uninitialized and EndInit marks it initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.BeginInit%2A>将标记的未初始化的字典和 EndInit 标记为已初始化。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Not supported by this Dictionary implementation.
trans-unit.target: 不支持此字典实现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> class does not support registering by name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>类不支持按名称注册。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: It uses keys instead.
trans-unit.target: 它使用的是键。

trans-unit.source: The name identifier for the object being requested.
trans-unit.target: 正在请求的对象名称标识符。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator>可用于循环访问<xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: The iterator is for the base dictionary only.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器是基字典。

trans-unit.source: A specialized enumerator for the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 为专用的枚举器<xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets whether this <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref> is fixed-size.
trans-unit.target: 获取是否这<xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref>是固定大小。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> default, which is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现返回<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>默认设置，即`false`。</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hash table is fixed-size; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果哈希表具有固定大小;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets whether this <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取是否这<xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref>是只读的。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> default, which is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>默认设置，即`false`。</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hash table is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果哈希表是只读的;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value associated with the given key.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与给定的键关联的值。

trans-unit.source: If the requested key is not in this resource dictionary, the framework resource system will also check the merged dictionaries.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求的项不是此资源字典中，框架资源系统还会检查合并的字典。

trans-unit.source: Checking a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> by item or index is not generally the preferred way to retrieve resources.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>按项或索引通常不检索资源的首选的方法。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: You should instead call methods that are capable of participating in the full resource lookup process and look up resources by their keys, and that can find the resources in applications or themes.
trans-unit.target: 你应改为调用的方法，是能够参与完整资源查找过程，并查找资源的其键，以及可以在应用程序或主题查找资源。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FindResource%2A> is such a method, and is present on any <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FindResource%2A>是此类方法，并且存在任何<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement></xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FindResource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise your attempt to find the resource does not match the true run-time behavior.
trans-unit.target: 否则你尝试查找资源不匹配的 true 的运行时行为。

trans-unit.source: However, obtaining resources directly from an individual dictionary might be appropriate if you are retrieving resources from a known <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> location, and are doing so to avoid the possible performance and scope implications of run-time key lookup.
trans-unit.target: 但是，直接从单个字典中获取资源可能适合情况就从已知在检索资源<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>位置，并且这样做，因此，若要避免可能性能和作用域的运行时键查找的影响。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: You do not use indexers to define collection members in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 不使用索引器定义中的集合成员[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you create child elements in markup.
trans-unit.target: 相反，你创建子元素标记中。

trans-unit.source: The child elements are either child elements of <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>, or of a property element where the property type is `ResourceDictionary`.
trans-unit.target: 子元素是中的任一子元素<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>，或其中属性类型是一个属性元素的`ResourceDictionary`。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: For details, see the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage sections in <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>中的使用情况部分

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本使用情况，请参阅备注。

trans-unit.source: The desired key to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 要获取或设置所需的密钥。

trans-unit.source: Value of the key.
trans-unit.target: 密钥的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all keys contained in this <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取集合中包含的所有键<xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property exists because it is required by <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>, but Keys generally is not useful for most <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 此属性存在，因为它必需的<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>，但密钥通常不适用于大多数<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>方案。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> </xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The returned keys do not include keys within the <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的键不包括内<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A>键

trans-unit.source: Also the keys collection is a snapshot of the keys in the base dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 此外键集合是基字典中的键的快照。

trans-unit.source: If you subsequently make changes to this <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>, a stored Keys will not reflect the changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果随后对此进行更改<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>，存储的密钥将不会反映所做的更改。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The collection of all keys.
trans-unit.target: 所有键的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref> dictionaries that constitute the various resource dictionaries in the merged dictionaries.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref>构成合并字典中的各种资源字典的字典。

trans-unit.source: Dictionaries are merged by adding a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> to the generic collection referenced by MergedDictionaries.
trans-unit.target: 通过添加合并字典<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>到所引用的 MergedDictionaries 的泛型集合。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: A merged <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> does not have resource elements defined within it in markup.
trans-unit.target: 合并<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>没有资源标记中定义的元素。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the merged dictionary is a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> with no markup child elements defined (or with no elements added through code), but with a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] specified for <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.Source%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 相反，合并的字典，它是<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>并且不包含标记子元素定义 （或通过代码添加任何元素），但与[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]指定<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.Source%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.Source%2A> designation enables the merged dictionary to come from an external source, such as a separate resource assembly that ships with the application, "loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]", or a specific localization or global resources assembly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.Source%2A>代码使合并来自外部源，如应用程序后，附带的单独的资源程序集的字典"松散[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]"，或特定的本地化或全局资源程序集。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifying resource elements within a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> that has <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.Source%2A> specified is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 指定资源中的元素<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>具有<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.Source%2A>指定不支持。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Lookup behavior within the MergedDictionaries collection will search the last-added <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> first, and the search stops as soon as a requested key is found.
trans-unit.target: MergedDictionaries 集合中的查找行为将搜索上一次添加<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>第一个和搜索停止就会立即找到请求的键。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Duplicate keys across the collection of merged dictionaries are not illegal.
trans-unit.target: 整个合并字典的集合的重复键不是非法的。

trans-unit.source: For more information on merged dictionary behavior, see [Merged Resource Dictionaries](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 合并的字典行为的详细信息，请参阅[合并的资源字典](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *oneOrMoreResourceDictionaries* One or more object elements.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性元素用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*oneOrMoreResourceDictionaries*一个或多个对象元素。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> used for MergedDictionaries does not have collection content, and specifies a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.Source%2A> attribute that references the complete <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> remotely.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>使用 MergedDictionaries 没有集合内容，并指定<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.Source%2A>引用完整的属性<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>远程。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> </xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The collection of merged dictionaries.
trans-unit.target: 合并字典的集合。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref> receives a request for a resource.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref>接收对资源的请求。

trans-unit.source: The key of the resource to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的资源键。

trans-unit.source: The value of the requested resource.
trans-unit.target: 所请求资源的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the resource can be saved and used later; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以保存资源，并且将其用于更高版本;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Not supported by this Dictionary implementation.
trans-unit.target: 不支持此字典实现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> class does not support registering by name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>类不支持按名称注册。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: It uses keys instead.
trans-unit.target: 它使用的是键。

trans-unit.source: The XAML namescope methods are implemented as inoperative versions in <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> to make it clear that XAML names do not apply to resources.
trans-unit.target: XAML 命名空间方法实现为中的无效版本<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>以使它清楚该 XAML 名称不适用于资源。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method will cause a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法将导致<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引发。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注。

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注。

trans-unit.source: In all cases when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下调用此方法时。

trans-unit.source: Removes the entry with the specified key from the base dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 从基字典中移除具有指定键项。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> does not contain an element with the specified key, the <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>不具有指定键，包含的元素<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>保持不变。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> </xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: No exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This method does not remove keys from the <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会从<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A>中删除密钥

trans-unit.source: You must obtain the specific <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> from the collection to remove those keys, but that might not be possible because you are typically accessing such a dictionary remotely.
trans-unit.target: 你必须获取特定于<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>从要移除的集合，这些键，但那可能不是可能由于通常要远程访问此类字典。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Key of the entry to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的项键。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref> is locked or read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"> </xref>被锁定或只读的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] to load resources from.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]加载资源。

trans-unit.source: Typically, Source is specified as a Pack URI, which references the location of a resource dictionary that is included as a noncompiled Resource or Content build action by your application building project.
trans-unit.target: 通常，源指定为一个包 URI，它引用包含作为非资源的资源字典的位置，或者内容由你的应用程序构建项目的生成操作。

trans-unit.source: For details on the Pack URI format, see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Pack URI 格式的详细信息，请参阅[WPF 中的包 Uri](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Generally, the Source property is set only for a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A> property (either as a property element in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or as a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> item of the collection in code).
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，只为设置的源属性则<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>为指定<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A>属性 (作为中的属性元素[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或被<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>代码中的集合的项)。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> </xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A> </xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: In this context, setting the value for Source will merge the dictionary contents found at the supplied [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] into the current <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 在此上下文中，将值设置为源将合并位于所提供的字典内容[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]到当前<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Any load failures will cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 任何加载失败将导致异常引发。

trans-unit.source: The source location of an external resource dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 外部资源字典中的源位置。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>接口。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <xref:System.Array> that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始<xref:System.Array>接收复制的项从<xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary"> </xref>。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The first position in the specified <xref:System.Array> to receive the copied contents.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的第一个位置<xref:System.Array>以接收复制的内容。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>接口。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果访问<xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref>是同步的 （线程安全）; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>接口。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 可以用于对访问进行同步的对象<xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>接口。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>可用于循环访问集合的对象。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext.BaseUri%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext.BaseUri%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext>接口。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> </xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current context.
trans-unit.target: 基[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的当前上下文。

trans-unit.source: Not supported by this Dictionary implementation.
trans-unit.target: 不支持此字典实现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> class does not support registering by name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>类不支持按名称注册。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: It uses keys instead.
trans-unit.target: 它使用的是键。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法没有任何影响。

trans-unit.source: See Remarks
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all values associated with keys contained in this <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此包含键相关联的所有值的集合<xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property exists because it is required by <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>, but generally is not useful for most <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 此属性存在，因为它必需的<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>，但通常不适用于大多数<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>方案。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> </xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The returned values do not include values within the <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的值不包括<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries%2A>内的值

trans-unit.source: Also the collection is a snapshot of the values in the base dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 此外该集合为基的字典中的值的快照。

trans-unit.source: If you subsequently make changes to this <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>, a stored Values will not reflect the changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果随后对此进行更改<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>，存储的值将不会反映所做的更改。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The collection of all values.
trans-unit.target: 所有值的集合。
